definitions: in a way that is able or likely to cause harm or injury

examples.text: during the night Mary was taken dangerously ill

shortDefinitions: in way that is able or likely to cause harm or injury

definitions: in a way that is likely to cause problems or to have adverse consequences

examples.text: stocks have been depleted to dangerously low levels

shortDefinitions: in way that is likely to cause problems or to have adverse consequences
